description: A production-ready Google Sheets-based Order-to-Payment (O2P) flow management system that standardizes and tracks the end-to-end lifecycle from customer order intake through fulfillment, invoicing, collections, and payment reconciliation. The system enforces data integrity via normalized master data, transaction records, workflow status tracking, approvals, and audit fields. It supports multi-role operations (Sales, Operations/Fulfillment, Finance/AR, Management) and provides reporting-ready structures for pipeline, aging, cash forecasting, and performance analytics.

integrations: Email (Gmail) for sending invoices and dunning notices
Google Drive for document storage (POs, signed delivery notes, remittance advice)
Accounting system export/import (CSV) for GL posting (e.g., QuickBooks/Xero/NetSuite)
Payment processor/bank statement import (CSV) for reconciliation
